name: Any Port In The Strom - Celebrate - Our Days Are Numbered 7" # WD 001
description:
"celebrate - our days are numbered" is the debut 7" of Kiel's ANY PORT IN THE STORM. It features 4 tracks of modern hardcore. While bands that take this polished approach usually lose the punk spirit, ANY PORT IN THE STORM is able to contain it in a very good way. For fans of the EFFORT, VERSE or FINAL FIGHT.

name: Goldust / Curbbite - Split 7" # WD 002
description:
Black-soaked, heavy Hardcore in the vein of early INTEGRITY or PULLING TEETH vs. ugly, brutal, down-tuned Stop-and-Go-Hardcore influenced by TRASH TALK, CROSSED OUT and SIEGE. Crushing violence from both German powerhouses. Total illness! Lim. to 500 copies. 300 on black, 100 on red and 100 on clear vinyl. - HARDWARE RECORDS / WALKING DEAD RECORDS



If you don´t have a paypal-account
get in touch with walkingdeadrec@gmail.com

name: Curbbite - s/t 7"
description:
This is the debut 7" from CURBBITE from Bremen. You'll get 6 tracks of maniac power-violence hardcore in the best Slap A Ham way - brutal, raw, aggressive, and powerful hardcore that will smack you down. If you dig the early-mid' 90 Bremen bands, like ACME, CAROL, SYSTRAL or MÖRSER you should buy this item, too.
